status.description:
Accessibility:
* https://[IP_ADDRESS]
* Login Creds Default: chefadmin [chefadmin]

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
sudo chef-server-ctl user-create @@{CHEF_USERNAME}@@ @@{FIRST_NAME}@@ @@{MIDDLE_NAME}@@ @@{LAST_NAME}@@ @@{EMAIL}@@ @@{CHEF_PASSWORD}@@
sudo chef-server-ctl org-create @@{CHEF_ORG_NAME}@@ '@@{CHEF_ORG_FULL_NAME}@@' --association_user @@{CHEF_USERNAME}@@

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes physical machines as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

action_list.description: System action for restarting an application
action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Does not delete physical machines
action_list.name: action_soft_delete

action_list.description: System action for creating an application

cloud_init.user_data:
#cloud-config
users:
  - name: centos
    ssh-authorized-keys:
      - @@{INSTANCE_PUBLIC_KEY}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']

action_list.description: System action for installing an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex

sudo yum install -y lvm2
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate chef_vg /dev/sdb
sleep 3
sudo lvcreate -l 100%VG -n chef_lvm chef_vg
sudo mkfs.xfs /dev/chef_vg/chef_lvm

echo -e "/dev/chef_vg/chef_lvm \t /opt \t xfs \t defaults \t 0 0" | sudo tee /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

sudo yum install -y wget

curl -L https://www.chef.io/chef/install.sh | sudo bash

sudo mkdir -p /var/chef/cache /var/chef/cookbooks

wget -qO- https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks/chef-server/versions/5.5.1/download | sudo tar xvzC /var/chef/cookbooks

for dep in chef-ingredient
do
  wget -qO- https://supermarket.chef.io/cookbooks/${dep}/download | sudo tar xvzC /var/chef/cookbooks
done

cat > /tmp/dna.json <<EOH
{
  "chef-server": {
    "api_fqdn": "chef-server",
    "addons": ["manage"],
    "accept_license": true,
    "version": "@@{CHEF_SERVER_VERSION}@@"
  }
}
EOH

# GO GO GO!!!
sudo chef-solo -o 'recipe[chef-server::default],recipe[chef-server::addons]' -j /tmp/dna.json

#Open firewalld
systemctl stop firewalld
echo "Chef server and client being uninstalled"

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
